description: Adelbert is the first important character that Yuuri meets in Shin Makoku. He is Julia`s former fianc√©e and abandons Shin Makoku, as he feels that the way of the Mazoku is wrong. He believes that the Mazoku are simply pawns of the Original King. Though in the beginning he is considered an enemy, as the series progresses he begins to protect Yuuri, though he still wants Yuuri to show him what he is worth as the new king.
name: von Grantz Adalbert
